amendment.description: Amendment adds child and adolescent mental health professionals to the list of high need professionals eligible for loan forgiveness under sec. 421 of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 109-401 to make child and adolescent mental health professionals eligible for loan forgiveness for high need professions under Sec. 421 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (RI) amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 380 - 38 (Roll no. 78).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A019) offered by Mr. Kennedy (RI).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kennedy (RI) amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 380 - 38 (Roll no. 78).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
